title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke bare mein baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Bachpan mein, rangon se khelna mujhe sabse zyada pasand tha. Diwaron pe, copy mein, jahan bhi jagah milti, rang bikher deti thi!
Anushka: Phir school ke dino mein, ek competition mein hissa liya…aur haar gayi. Dil toot gaya tha.
Anushka: Maine socha, shayad main kabhi achchi artist nahi ban paungi. Lekin maa ne kaha, "Haarna bhi seekhne ka ek tareeka hai, Anushka."
Anushka: Unki baat ne jaise magic kiya. Maine dubara try kiya, aur try karti rahi.
Anushka: Dhire dhire, mujhe ehsaas hua ki kala sirf perfect drawing banana nahi hai, balki apne dil ki baat canvas par utaarna hai.
Anushka: Aaj, main jo bhi karti hoon, apne dil se karti hoon. Aur yahi meri art journey hai – hamesha seekhna, hamesha badhna.
Anushka: Umeed hai aapko meri choti si kahani pasand aayi! Dhanyavaad!
